us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces

Interface ReferenceFrameHolder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics, FixedFrameLine2DBasics, FixedFrameLine3DBasics, FixedFrameLineSegment2DBasics, FixedFrameLineSegment3DBasics, FixedFrameOrientation2DBasics, FixedFramePoint2DBasics, FixedFramePoint3DBasics, FixedFramePose2DBasics, FixedFramePose3DBasics, FixedFrameQuaternionBasics, FixedFrameTuple2DBasics, FixedFrameTuple3DBasics, FixedFrameTuple4DBasics, FixedFrameVector2DBasics, FixedFrameVector3DBasics, FixedFrameVector4DBasics, FrameChangeable, FrameConvexPolygon2DBasics, FrameConvexPolygon2DReadOnly, FrameLine2DBasics, FrameLine2DReadOnly, FrameLine3DBasics, FrameLine3DReadOnly, FrameLineSegment2DBasics, FrameLineSegment2DReadOnly, FrameLineSegment3DBasics, FrameLineSegment3DReadOnly, FrameOrientation2DBasics, FrameOrientation2DReadOnly, FramePoint2DBasics, FramePoint2DReadOnly, FramePoint3DBasics, FramePoint3DReadOnly, FramePose2DBasics, FramePose2DReadOnly, FramePose3DBasics, FramePose3DReadOnly, FrameQuaternionBasics, FrameQuaternionReadOnly, FrameTuple2DBasics, FrameTuple2DReadOnly, FrameTuple3DBasics, FrameTuple3DReadOnly, FrameTuple4DBasics, FrameTuple4DReadOnly, FrameVector2DBasics, FrameVector2DReadOnly, FrameVector3DBasics, FrameVector3DReadOnly, FrameVector4DBasics, FrameVector4DReadOnly
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrameConvexPolygon2D, FrameGeometryObject, FrameLine2D, FrameLine3D, FrameLineSegment2D, FrameLineSegment3D, FrameOrientation2D, FramePoint2D, FramePoint3D, FramePose2D, FramePose3D, FrameQuaternion, FrameVector2D, FrameVector3D, FrameVector4D

    public interface ReferenceFrameHolder
    ReferenceFrameHolder represents an object to which a ReferenceFrame can be associated.

    This interface provides the methods from comparing the reference frames associated with two objects and comparing the reference frame associated to an object against another reference frame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void checkReferenceFrameMatch(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame)
      Checks if the frame held by this matches the query referenceFrame.
      default void checkReferenceFrameMatch(ReferenceFrameHolder other)
      Checks if the frames held by this and other match.
      ReferenceFrame getReferenceFrame()
      Gets the reference frame currently associated with this.

    • Method Detail

      • checkReferenceFrameMatch

        default void checkReferenceFrameMatch(ReferenceFrameHolder other)
                               throws ReferenceFrameMismatchException
        Checks if the frames held by this and other match.
        Parameters:
        other - the other object holding onto the reference frame to compare against the reference frame held by this. Not modified.
        Throws:
        ReferenceFrameMismatchException - if the two reference frames are not the same: this.getReferenceFrame() != other.getReferenceFrame().

      • checkReferenceFrameMatch

        default void checkReferenceFrameMatch(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame)
                               throws ReferenceFrameMismatchException
        Checks if the frame held by this matches the query referenceFrame.
        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - the query to compare against the reference frame held by this. Not modified.
        Throws:
        ReferenceFrameMismatchException - if the two reference frames are not the same: this.getReferenceFrame() != referenceFrame.

      • getReferenceFrame

        ReferenceFrame getReferenceFrame()
        Gets the reference frame currently associated with this.
        Returns:
        the reference frame associated with this.
